_jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const BuyNowPage=()=>{const{isLoggedIn}=useAuthentication();const{itemsToBuy,setItemsToBuy,listOfProducts}=useField();const
